name: African Craft Survival Simulator 3D
description:
Be ready for extreme survival adventures in African desert with this 3D simulator! Become a blocky survivor and survive into the wilderness, exploring the African landscape made of pixels and cubes. Fight for your life against ferocious predators, hunt animals for food, collect resources to build shelters and craft weapons and tools to survive playing African Craft Survival Simulator 3D! Make this wild and unfriendly desert your home and have fun! Win the war with a cruel world to stay alive!

What is it like to live on lost desert island inhabited by aggressive creatures? There are no friendly animals, most of them are aggressive predators. Be ready to meet pixel rhinos, cube crocodiles, blocky lions and African elephants ready to attack!

Explore this strange pixel world and prove yourself as a real survivor! You should learn how to hunt, fish, plant, craft and build, 'cause it’s vital for you! Complete different missions to unlock new recipes of weapons and tools, raise up your skills and feel the real taste of desert with this island survival simulator in 3D! Use all your martial and survival skills to stay alive, salvage tools and weapons to unravel the dirty secrets of this goddamned place! Hunt for animals and find fresh water to increase your indicators, but be careful - cube predators may hunt you instead! Kill or be killed at this strange survival island! Enjoy the atmosphere of desert wild Africa and beautiful views of amazing crafty landscapes! Stay alive at all costs playing African Craft Survival Simulator 3D!

Fight for your life every second, face dangers, but don’t forget to mind survivor’s indicators - health, energy and hunger. Never let it drops – stay alive and try to escape this hot wild place! There are a lot of things that might be helpful on this survival island – useful resources, hidden weapons and tools! Use survival tools such as cube axe or blocky fish rod to get food or craft a shovel to dig faster! Hunt, start fishing or collect plant food to your hunger at bay to survive! Find treasures, cube weapons and special tools exploring this mysterious blocky desert island with African Craft Survival Simulator 3D game!

Attack first to prevent own death! Don't forget - this lost survival island is flooded by wild animals - and most of them are predators! So, keep your weapons alert and be careful! Explore cube island, hunt, fish and search for food! But remember, that this picturesque landscape is full of predators ready to attack you! Find or craft weapons to protect yourself from wild desert’s predators or even make preventive raids against them! Use all your exploration, battling and survival skills to stay alive at all cost with African Craft Survival Simulator 3D!
Are you ready for great African adventure? Get survival skills that would help you to stay alive with lost desert island survival simulator! It’s not easy to survive in this hot and dry environments!

African Craft Survival Simulator 3D features:


- Explore wild African desert – spend time on lost survival island made of pixels and blocks
- Mind survivor’s indicators – build hideouts to hide from tropical sun, find fresh water and provide yourself with food
- Find weapons, collect resources and craft useful tools – cube guns, pixel roads, blocky shovel and so on
- Use your exploration, fighting and survival skills to stay alive with all costs
- Amazing survival simulator in 3D

Test your skills in extreme conditions playing African Craft Survival Simulator 3D game! Learn to battle against predators, hunt, fish and to evade desert animal’s attacks. Plunge into the wilderness being a real survivor to make unfriendly craft island your home! Hide in jungles, fight for your life and enjoy this hostile environment playing African Craft Survival Simulator 3D! Explore pixel island and enjoy being a part of the wildlife!
